name: The Youth Systemâ„¢
about: What it is:A set of six pro-grade vegan minis stacked with superfood antioxidants to clean pores, exfoliate, hydrate, and visibly brighten and firm for optimal skin health..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Dryness, and Uneven Texture.Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Want to clean up your routine? Start here. This skin-improvement kit is designed with enough flex to work across all skin types and goals to help you form consistent rituals that create positive change in your skin and yourself in 30 days..This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser
ingredients: Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sorbeth-230 Tetraoleate, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe Vera) Juice Powder, Brassica Oleracea Acephala (Kale) Leaf Extract, Spinacia Oleracea (Spinach) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Morning: .-Cleanse with Superfood Antioxidant Cleanser. .-Follow with two to four pumps of 15% Vitamin C + Clean Caffeine Energy Serum and finish with Superfood Air-Whip Moisture Cream to visibly brighten and lock in hydration. .-Top with your favorite SPF.  .-Twice a week, start your ritual by gently massaging Yerba Mate Resurfacing Energy Facial onto clean, wet skin. Leave on for two minutes. Rinse and continue the routine...Evening:.-After cleansing, gently pat Superberry Dream Eye Cream around the eyes. .-Add a few drops of Superberry Hydrate + Glow Dream Oil to Superfood Air-Whip Moisture Cream and massage into skin before heading into dreamland. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Take off caps and dispose into its proper container..-You can check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one..-Wash the glass jar thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse, then dry..-If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed-waste stream, like paper..-Place in your recycling bin, and voila, your glass jar can now be infinitely recycled.
